title: Mountain View – Not a Parking Lot View  w this1 br apt
posting_body: ----- Apartment for Rent: Residential Neighborhood and Nice Views -----
Available now.
View of the Mountains from the Kitchen / Living Area.
View of a Denver Park from the Bedroom.
A mother-in law-apartment or a private apartment that is inside of a nice 1950's style residential dwelling in a peaceful  residential neighborhood.
The apartment has three rooms: a bedroom, a bathroom and a kitchen / living area.
There is plenty of storage with a closet and extra storage in each room.
There is access to a washer and dryer and extra storage in the basement.
There is free parking right in front of the house.
----- Natural Materials: Hardwood and Ceramic Tile on Floors -----
The bedroom and kitchen have hardwood oak floors and hand textured plaster walls and ceiling.
The floor, shower / tub enclosure and the walls are ceramic tile below and plaster above.
Well maintained.
The bathroom has a granite counter, an oak cabinet and an extra storage closet.
The kitchen has maple and oak cabinets and shelves and a Formica counter top.
There is a refrigerator, microwave and natural gas four burner stove and oven.
Hot water heating is provided by a boiler and baseboard radiators.
High Speed Internet available.
There is central air conditioning and a swamp cooler available for lower cost cooling.
Convenient Location with Lots of Amenities
Nearby -------
The apartment is located in the 49th and Sheridan area.
Grocery stores, restaurants, and lots of other shopping are conveniently nearby.
There are extensive hiking and biking trails nearby, a public golf course, a Denver Recreation Center, tennis courts, and a private fitness center.
Major Highways and Public Transportation
Nearby -----
Interstate 70, I 76 and I 25 are all nearby and easy to get to.
It's close to public transportation.
There are three bus routes nearby and a light rail line is a short drive, bike ride or Uber ride away.
----- Reply for More Details and a Room-by-Room Video -----
For more details and to receive a link to view a video of the apartment please send your name and email.
